questions.text: For the reporting period, what was the business' total value of construction and acquisitions of land?
For the reporting period, what was the business' total value of proceeds from disposals of land and assets?

For the reporting period, what was your business's total value of proceeds from disposals of rolling stock?
For the reporting period, what was your business's total value of retail acquisitions at stations?
For the reporting period, what was your business's total value of proceeds from retail disposals at stations?
For the reporting period, what was your business's total value of other acquisitions at stations?
For the reporting period, what was your business's total value of proceeds from other disposals at stations?

Please provide any further details that will help us understand your figures and to tell an industry story
